EmailTemplate.name: Increase_Utilization.Increase_Utilization_Nurture_3_Customer_Success
EmailTemplate.subject: 33% Workload Density Improvement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Have you struggled to manage application performance in your virtual environment? You're not alone. CenturyLink faced this same challenge.
In their firstÂ four years of virtualization, the CenturyLink team's VMs increased by a factor of 12. Needing to get a better handle on their data centers, as well as stronger capacity planning capabilities, they turned to Turbonomic. Learn more! <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/safely-increase-infrastructure-utilization/centurylink-success-story]]>
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/safely-increase-infrastructure-utilization/centurylink-success-story]]>
Interested in taking a closer look? See how over 1,900 of our customers <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies]]> leverage workload automation to simultaneously optimize performance, cost and policy compliance in real-time.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
